dmca.title: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: HKKOBRIN@aol.com [mailto:HKKOBRIN@aol.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2007 8:03 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: Fwd: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement 

 

Dear Ms. Almeida,

 

Can you please confirm that you received the DMCA notice that I am
forwarding to you here?  Can you tell me when I will hear back from you
on this?

 

Sincerely,

Helena Kobrin
Moxon & Kobrin
3055 Wilshire Blvd., Ste. 900
Los Angeles, CA 90010
213-487-4468
213-487-5385 (Fax)
